name: citation-linker
description: Follow research paper citations seamlessly and organize your research with annotations

scripts.start: npm run build && DISPLAY=:0 web-ext run --source-dir ./ --keep-profile-changes --start-url https://www.ajmc.com/view/advances-and-limitations-in-cd20-targeted-car-t-cell-therapy
scripts.startverbose: npm run build && DISPLAY=:0 web-ext run --source-dir ./ --keep-profile-changes --verbose --start-url https://www.ajmc.com/view/advances-and-limitations-in-cd20-targeted-car-t-cell-therapy
